accept.description: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file")

accesskey.description: Defines a keyboard shortcut to activate or focus on the element

alt.description: Specifies an alternative text for images

autocomplete.description: Specifies whether the element should have autocomplete enabled

autofocus.description: Specifies that the element should automatically get focus when the page loads

autoplay.description: Specifies that the audio/video should start playing as soon as it is ready

buffered.description: Returns a TimeRanges object representing the buffered parts of the audio/video

challenge.description: Specifies a challenge-response test to ensure that the form was filled out by a human and not a computer

charset.description: Specifies the character encoding used in the element

checked.description: Specifies that an input element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio")

cite.description: Specifies a URL which explains the quote/deleted/inserted text

class.description: Specifies one or more class names for an element (refers to a class in a style sheet)

cols.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area

colspan.description: Specifies the number of columns a table cell should span

content.description: Gives the value associated with the http-equiv or name attribute

contenteditable.description: Specifies whether the content of an element is editable or not

controls.description: Specifies that audio/video controls should be displayed (such as a play/pause button etc)

coords.description: Specifies the coordinates of the area

data.description: Specifies the URL of the resource to be used by the object

default.description: Specifies that the track is to be enabled if the user's preferences do not indicate that another track would be more appropriate

defer.description: Specifies that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing (only for external scripts)

dir.description: Sets the text directionality of the content within an element

download.description: Prompts the user to save the linked URL instead of navigating to it

draggable.description: Indicates whether an element is draggable

dropzone.description: Specifies whether the dragged data is copied, moved, or linked when dropped

enctype.description: Specifies how the form data should be encoded when submitting to the server

for.description: Associates a label with a form control

form.description: Indicates the form that an element belongs to

formaction.description: Specifies the URL to which the form data will be submitted when a form is submitted

headers.description: Defines a list of header cells that are associated with a data cell

height.description: Specifies the height of an element

high.description: Specifies the range that is considered to be a high value

href.description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to

hreflang.description: Specifies the language of the linked document

http-equiv.description: Provides an HTTP header for the information/value of the content attribute

id.description: Specifies a unique id for an element

inputmode.description: Specifies what kind of input mechanism would be most helpful for users entering content into the element
inputmode.value: none | text | decimal | numeric | tel | search | email | url

integrity.description: Specifies the expected cryptographic digest of the resource

is.description: Indicates the tag name of the element it is applied to

ismap.description: Specifies that an image should be part of a server-side image map

itemid.description: Specifies a unique identifier for an item

itemprop.description: Specifies the property of an item

itemref.description: Specifies one or more elements that contain additional information about the item

itemscope.description: Specifies that the element is an item and defines its scope

itemtype.description: Specifies the URL of the vocabulary that describes the item

keytype.description: Specifies the type of key generated by the keygen element

kind.description: Specifies the kind of text track

label.description: Specifies the label for the element

lang.description: Specifies the language of the element's content

language.description: Specifies the script language of the element

list.description: Refers to a datalist element that contains pre-defined options for an input element

loop.description: Specifies that the audio/video will start over again, every time it is finished

low.description: Specifies the lower bound of the range

manifest.description: Specifies the address of the document's cache manifest

max.description: Specifies the maximum value for the element

maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the element

media.description: Specifies what media/device the linked document is optimized for

method.description: Specifies the HTTP method used when submitting the form

min.description: Specifies the minimum value for the element

minlength.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in the element

multiple.description: Specifies that a user can enter more than one value in an input element

muted.description: Specifies that the audio output of the video should be muted

name.description: Specifies a name for the element

novalidate.description: Specifies that the form should not be validated when submitted

open.description: Specifies that the details should be visible (open) to the user

optimum.description: Specifies what value is the optimal value for the gauge

pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression to check the value of an input element

ping.description: Specifies a list of URLs to be notified if a user follows the hyperlink

placeholder.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an input element

poster.description: Specifies an image to be shown while the video is downloading, or until the user hits the play button

preload.description: Specifies if and how the author thinks the audio/video should be loaded when the page loads

readonly.description: Specifies that the input field is read-only

referrerpolicy.description: Specifies which referrer information to send when fetching the resource

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document/resource

required.description: Specifies that the input field must be filled out before submitting the form

reversed.description: Specifies that the list order should be descending (9,8,7...)

rows.description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area

rowspan.description: Specifies the number of rows a table cell should span

sandbox.description: Enables an extra set of restrictions for the content in an iframe

scope.description: Specifies whether a header cell is a header for a column, row, or group of columns or rows

selected.description: Indicates whether an option in a <select> element is pre-selected on page load

shape.description: Specifies the shape of an <area> element for use with image maps

size.description: Specifies the size of an <input> element (in characters)

sizes.description: Specifies a set of possible sizes for an icon

slot.description: Assigns a slot in a shadow DOM

span.description: Specifies the number of columns a <col> element should span

spellcheck.description: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not

src.description: Specifies the URL of the media file

srcdoc.description: Specifies the HTML content of the page to show in the <iframe>

srclang.description: Specifies the language of the track text data (required if kind="subtitles")

srcset.description: Specifies the URL of the image to use in different situations (e.g. high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc)

start.description: Specifies the start value of a <ol> element

step.description: Specifies the legal number intervals for an <input> element

style.description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element

tabindex.description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element

target.description: Specifies the target for where to open the linked document or where to submit the form

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element

translate.description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not

typemustmatch.description: Specifies whether the type attribute and the actual content of the resource must match to be displayed

usemap.description: Specifies an image as a client-side image map

value.description: Specifies the value of an element

width.description: Specifies the width of an element

wrap.description: Specifies how the text in a text area is to be wrapped when submitted in a form
